Condition Name: Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease (CJD) and Variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease (vCJD)
Hepatitis B Virus Infection, Perinatal (previously Perinatal Hepatitis B Virus Infection)
Influenza-associated pediatric mortality (previously Pediatric Influenza-Associated Mortality)
Lead in Blood (previously Elevated Blood Lead Level)
Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection, Extrapulmonary (previously Extrapulmonary Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection)
Rectal and Large Intestinal Atresia and Stenosis
Silicosis or pneumoconiosis due to dust containing silica
Streptococcal disease, invasive, Group A (previously Streptococcal disease, invasive)
Tuberculosis, Latent Infection (LTBI) (previously Latent Tuberculosis Infection [LTBI])
